properties.areaDesc: Miller, GA; Decatur, GA; Seminole, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:41PM EST by NWS Tallahassee FL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Spring Creek near Iron City (CR 16) affecting Decatur...Miller and
Seminole Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
the Spring Creek near Iron City (CR 16).
* Until further notice.
* At  8:15 PM Monday the stage was 17.2 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Forecast: The river will continue to fall to a stage of 16.0 feet by Tuesday night.
* Impact: At 18.0 feet: Flood waters approach homes near Yates Road
and Smith Landing.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interest along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts, and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property. Do not drive cars through flooded areas. If you
see flood waters: Turn around. Don't drown.

For graphical hydrologic information, please go to weather.gov and
click on your state. Select Rivers and Lakes AHPS under current
conditions and click on your river point.
